function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential leakage of viral aerosols due to inadequate sealing of chamber parts.","Impact":"Uncontrolled release of viral aerosols into the environment, increasing the risk of disease transmission.","Mitigation":"Ensure proper sealing of chamber parts and use gaskets to prevent leaks.","Technologies":"Use of advanced sealing materials and inspection techniques to ensure airtightness.","People":"Researchers, lab technicians, and individuals working with the chamber.","Owner":"Research institution or laboratory management."},{"Description":"Contamination of the experimental chamber by microorganisms due to inadequate filtration or backflow prevention.","Impact":"Increased risk of exposure to harmful microorganisms and potential contamination of the environment.","Mitigation":"Use of high-efficiency particulate air (HEPA) filters and periodic maintenance of filtration systems.","Technologies":"HEPA filters, airflow monitoring systems, and backflow prevention devices.","People":"Lab technicians, maintenance personnel, and individuals working with the chamber.","Owner":"Research institution or laboratory management."},{"Description":"Potential exposure to viral aerosols during chamber maintenance and operation.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and illness among individuals working with the chamber.","Mitigation":"Use of personal protective equipment (PPE) such as masks, gloves, and protective clothing, and implementation of proper handling procedures.","Technologies":"PPE, containment enclosures, and decontamination systems.","People":"Lab technicians, maintenance personnel, and individuals working with the chamber.","Owner":"Research institution or laboratory management."}]}
